seo.metaDescription: Soothe and strengthen your scalp with polynucleotide injections. Perfect maintenance between PRP or exosome sessions for healthier hair.

schema.howPerformed: After cleansing your scalp and applying numbing cream, purified polynucleotide solution (DNA fragments) is injected using ultra-fine needles across thinning or irritated areas. Each injection delivers hydration and anti-inflammatory molecules that soothe your scalp and create the perfect environment for healthy hair growth. The process takes about 20 minutes. You'll feel tiny pinpricks—brief and tolerable—followed by a cooling LED light session that enhances absorption
schema.preparation: Wash your hair the morning of treatment with gentle shampoo (no styling products). Eat beforehand to keep blood sugar stable. Avoid alcohol and blood-thinning supplements for 3 days prior. Come with realistic expectations—PN is for scalp health and maintenance, not dramatic regrowth alone (combine with PRP or exosomes for that)
schema.followup: Avoid washing hair for 24 hours to let PN absorb fully. Small bumps at injection sites are normal and fade overnight. No vigorous scalp massage for 3 days. Avoid swimming, saunas, and intense sweating for 48 hours. Use the recommended gentle shampoo and scalp serum. Attend all three sessions (spaced 3-4 weeks apart) for cumulative benefits
schema.outcome: Scalp feels calmer, less tight, and more comfortable. Itching and flakiness reduce dramatically. Hair shafts appear shinier and healthier. Your scalp becomes the optimal environment for follicles to thrive. Results last 4-6 months. PN works best as maintenance between PRP/exosome sessions or for people with sensitive scalps who can't tolerate minoxidil
schema.treatmentFrequency: Three sessions spaced 3-4 weeks apart initially, then quarterly maintenance sessions to keep scalp healthy and hydrated
schema.adverseOutcome: Small raised bumps at injection sites for 12-24 hours. Mild scalp tenderness for 1-2 days. Very rarely, temporary increased shedding as scalp resets (resolves within 2 weeks)
contraindication: Active scalp infection or open wounds
Severe autoimmune scalp conditions without specialist clearance
typicalTest: Scalp examination for inflammation, dryness, or irritation

longDescription: If your scalp feels irritated, flaky, or tight, follicles can’t thrive. Polynucleotide injections deliver purified DNA fragments that calm inflammation, attract moisture, and rebuild the extracellular matrix around each follicle. Think of it as Pilates for your scalp barrier—flexible, resilient, and ready for growth.
